statements.query: MATCH (n:AWSTransitGateway)-[r:RESOURCE|SHARED_WITH]-() WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:AWSTransitGatewayAttachment)-[r:RESOURCE|ATTACHED_TO]-() WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:AWSTransitGateway)-[r:RESOURCE|SHARED_WITH]-() WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
MATCH (n:AWSTransitGatewayAttachment)-[r:RESOURCE|ATTACHED_TO]-() WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
